data.title: 以 1 到 3 分钟谈论以下主题
data.content: What is one thing that motivates you to get up every morning and get going? Explain the reasons for your choice.
data.answer: Doing exercises is the thing that motivates me to get up early every morning. Before having any food in the morning, I look so much more fitter than in the evening. If I look into the mirror in the morning, I can see my perfect abs and triceps without any fat. Now it is also a perfect time for me to start some aerobic exercises before breakfast such as running, jogging, or jumping the rope. And then I will cook breakfast as a little rest for the aerobic exercises and also as a protein supply. Then I wait for 30 minutes because I don't want to suffer appendicitis, and I will continue to do some anaerobic exercises to shape my muscles.
